QuestData.Title: Trading Up
QuestData.Description: Hobart thinks he's going to feed us on those tiny clucker eggs? Bah! We're going to get some real eggs!$B$BI've already set up some traps on the Raptor Rise up the path to the east. Take this bunch of wild clucker eggs and lay them in the traps. The spiny raptors will go right after the clucker eggs, and then you'll get to trade up to their larger eggs.$B$BGenius!
QuestData.CompletionText: How many did you get? I can just taste the massive omelet we're going to cook up now!
QuestData.RewardText: Nice! Look at the size of those things!$B$BThere's no way that Grapplehammer's going to be able to top those!
